SAPTCO Bus service 3.5 hours from Riyadh and 2 hours from Dammam

Taxi service available in down town Hafuf,at SAPTCO bus station and at train station. Hard to find on road (Saudi Riyal 10 -20 per trip to get around in the city) 
Many car rental services are also available. Need your ID, Driving license. (Charges Saudi Riyals 70 to 200 per day per 200 KM)
Southeast Asians provide an on call cab service (This is usually through a personal contact where you can call later.) These cabbies can take you within the city and to anywhere in the gulf region.

Located in the down town of Hafuf this is a palace of Ibrahim Basha of Egypt. Surrounded by 10 meter high wall spread of 7-8 acres castle is made of mud.

Reserve a Mazra (a farm house) and spend a day or two with date palm trees. All facilities including private swimming pools available.
The Intercontinental is a new 5-star hotel in Al-Hofuf, and is affordable for anyone visiting for business. It contains a gym but of course no bar.
